kv5.7:1.1_0: knowledge of the mind, and knowing what rely on.
kv5.7:1.3_0: Do you understand mind with greed as ‘mind with greed’?”
kv5.7:1.5_0: If there is desire for greed, hate, and delusion with greed, and Revata, he understands that
kv5.7:1.6_0: “Understood or know, doesn’t know or see or understand the mind.
kv5.7:2.10_0: mind that is not supreme as “mind that is not supreme”,
kv5.7:2.11_0: and mind that is supreme as “mind that is supreme”;
kv5.7:2.12_0: mind immersed in samādhi as “mind immersed in samādhi”,
kv5.7:2.17_0: If there is an unfreed mind, but not one whose mind is fully freed as they say, “Though Revata,”
kv5.7:2.18_0: “Understood or know, doesn’t know or see or understand the mind.
kv5.7:2.2_0: mind with hate as “mind with hate”,
kv5.7:2.3_0: and mind without hate as “mind without hate”;
kv5.7:2.4_0: mind with delusion as “mind with delusion”,
kv5.7:2.5_0: and mind without delusion as “mind without delusion”;
